body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Water or amphibious racial trait; Benefit: Members of this race can sense vibrations in water, granting them blindsense 30 feet against creatures that are touching the same body of water.
name: Water Sense
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Senses Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Water Sense
